steps: Add eggs to a pot. Fill with enough cold water so that the level is about an inch above the eggs. Sprinkle in salt.
Set to high heat, bringing the water to a boil.
Once boiling, remove from heat and immediately cover. Let sit for 8-10 minutes.
Transfer eggs to a bowl of ice water for at least 1 minute.
Eggs can be consumed immediately or refrigerated for leader consumption.
